userestrict.head: Publication Rights/ Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Before publishing quotations or excerpts from any materials, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Librarian/ Associate Curator of Rare Books and Manuscripts, and the holder of the copyright, if not the Rockefeller Library at Colonial Williamsburg.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Order of the General Court, 1761 Apr 25, Manuscript # 2000.33, John D. Rockefeller, Jr. Library, Colonial Williamsburg Foundation

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Brown vs. Brown. Joseph Brown's appeal of the Loudon County, Virginia, court's decision denying the validity of a verbal gift of two slaves. Virginia General Court orders a new contestation of the case. Order signed by Benjamin Waller as clerk of the court.
